metadata.title: CVE-2020-22675 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gpac 0.8.0. The GetGhostNum function in stbl_read.c has a heap-based buffer overflow which can lead to a denial of service (DOS) via a crafted input.

criterions.comment: gpac package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
